title: 75/162. Enlargement of the Executive Committee of the Programme of the United Nations High Commissioner for Refugees
text:
United Nations 
A/RES/75/162
 
 
General Assembly 
Distr.: General 
23 December 2020 
 
 
20-17299 (E)    301220 
*2017299* 
 
 
Seventy-fifth session 
Agenda item 63 
Report of the United Nations High Commissioner for 
Refugees, questions relating to refugees, returnees and 
displaced persons and humanitarian questions  
 
 
 
 
 Resolution adopted by the General Assembly 
on 16 December 2020 
 
 
 
 
[on the report of the Third Committee (A/75/472, para. 17)] 
 
 
 75/162. Enlargement of the Executive Committee of the Programme of the 
United Nations High Commissioner for Refugees 
 
 
 
The General Assembly, 
 
Taking note of Economic and Social Council decision 2021/208 of 14 September 
2020 concerning the enlargement of the Executive Committee of the Programme of 
the United Nations High Commissioner for Refugees, 
 
Taking note also of the request regarding the enlargement of the Executive 
Committee contained in the note verbale dated 31 August 2020 from the Permanent 
Mission of Malawi to the United Nations addressed to the Secretary-General,1 
 
1. 
Decides to increase the number of members of the Executive Committee 
of the Programme of the United Nations High Commissioner for Refugees from 
106 States to 107 States; 
 
2. 
Requests the Economic and Social Council to elect the additional member 
at a meeting of its management segment in 2021. 
 
46th plenary meeting 
16 December 2020 
 
 
__________________ 
 
1 E/2021/3.

paragraphs.1: Decides to increase the number of members of the Executive Committee of the Programme of the United Nations High Commissioner for Refugees from 106 States to 107 States;
paragraphs.2: Requests the Economic and Social Council to elect the additional member at a meeting of its management segment in 2021. 46th plenary meeting 16 December 2020 __________________ 1 E/2021/3.
